  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.expressions.evaluationstates.ArrayDescriptor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type on which operations are to be executed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Arrays.ConstrainedDomain<T>, Arrays.Descriptor<T>, TypedRangeDescription.TypedRangeProperties<T>, ValueManager.Metadata

    public class ArrayFunctionDescriptor<T>
extends ArrayDescriptor<T>
    a descripor for arrays that describe functions

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrayFunctionDescriptor

        public ArrayFunctionDescriptor(java.lang.String identifier,
                               T lo,
                               T hi,
                               T delta,
                               ExpressionSpaceManager<T> manager)
        the data required to describe an array function
        Parameters:
        identifier - the name of the variable that represents the x-axis
        lo - the lo value of the domain constraint for the function
        hi - the hi value of the domain constraint for the function
        delta - the x-axis increment between elements of the array
        manager - a manager for the underlying data type

      • ArrayFunctionDescriptor

                               ExpressionSpaceManager<T> manager)
        copy metadata from another descriptor and alter the domain constraints
        Parameters:
        descriptor - the descriptor used as the basis for the parameters
        lo - the new lo value for the constraint
        hi - the new hi value for the constraint
        manager - the manager for the type
